channel.title: Ted the caver
channel.description:
Found this while reading this thread on somethingawful http://forums.somethingawful.com/showthread.php?threadid=2784616&userid=0&perpage=40&pagenumber=1
[url=http://www.angelfire.com/trek/caver/]Ted the caver[/url] Some of you may have read this before.

item.title: Ted the caver
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

It was written by some dude in the late 80’s. In the original story it ended with some retarded shit about a farm girl dieing.
They made it very believable with the pictures and stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Ted the caver
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:7, topic:252559”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=333551.msg2600767#msg2600767 date=1230216517]
There are some sites that have 2 extra pages, that supposedly contain some stuff written by his sister. As ThAt0n36Uy said, the story is supposed to stop like that. Ted, Joe and B go back to the cave and never return.
[/quote]
Thank you for finishing the story for me![/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Ted the caver
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

There are some sites that have 2 extra pages, that supposedly contain some stuff written by his sister. As ThAt0n36Uy said, the story is supposed to stop like that. Ted, Joe and B go back to the cave and never return.

Thank you for finishing the story for me!

Read full topic

item.title: Ted the caver
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:5, topic:252559”][quote author=Ske link=topic=333551.msg2599003#msg2599003 date=1230130705]
Can’t believe i read everything…

But the story about Ted the caver seems kinda fake.
The main 2 suspicious things are he didnt show us the pictures of the hieroglyphics.
He made that up with a lousy explanation.

The second is because he “forgot” to take the camera with him.

Didn’t even finish his fictional story.
[/quote]

No, by not completing it, leaves you to infer that they did not ever make it out of the cave. It’s obviously fictional, but a very good read nonetheless.

I love suspense, but I also hate it. I love the feeling I get, but I hate the waiting to get to the end, to get the answers.[/quote]

There are some sites that have 2 extra pages, that supposedly contain some stuff written by his sister. As ThAt0n36Uy said, the story is supposed to stop like that. Ted, Joe and B go back to the cave and never return.

Read full topic

item.title: Ted the caver
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:3, topic:252559”]Can’t believe i read everything…

But the story about Ted the caver seems kinda fake.
The main 2 suspicious things are he didnt show us the pictures of the hieroglyphics.
He made that up with a lousy explanation.

The second is because he “forgot” to take the camera with him.

Didn’t even finish his fictional story.[/quote]

No, by not completing it, leaves you to infer that they did not ever make it out of the cave. It’s obviously fictional, but a very good read nonetheless.

I love suspense, but I also hate it. I love the feeling I get, but I hate the waiting to get to the end, to get the answers.

Read full topic

item.title: Ted the caver
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Wow what a crap ending. Had me on the end of my seat most of the time though. Was a good story, even if I didn’t understand some of it.

Read full topic

The second is because he “forgot” to take the camera with him.
